intents.response: Hello! I'm Rohan's AI assistant. I can answer questions about his skills, projects, and experience based on his CV. What would you like to know?

Rohan is an AI/ML engineer with expertise in deep learning, computer vision, and real-time AI systems. He is skilled in designing, training, and deploying ML models for healthcare, defence, and automation.

Rohan is a strong candidate with proven expertise in building end-to-end AI systems. His project work in real-time drone detection and medical image analysis, along with his internship experience at BEL, demonstrates his ability to tackle complex challenges effectively.
You can ask me about the following topics:
Rohan's technical skills are divided into several areas. Which would you like to know more about?
For ML & AI, he is skilled in Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Neural Networks, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, OpenCV, YOLO, Faster R-CNN, and CLIP.
His programming skills include Python, C/C++, C#/.NET, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, and Streamlit.
In Data Science, he is proficient with Data Preprocessing, Feature Engineering, Model Evaluation, Visualization, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn.
He has experience with PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL, and PL/SQL.
His development tools include Git, Docker, Linux, PIL, and Torch.
He has several key projects. Which one would you like to know more about?

He built a Keras-based multi-output CNN for drone detection and subtype classification. The system achieved over 85% confidence and reduced false positives by 30%. You can view the code on [GitHub](https://github.com/ARPurohit07/Military-Drone-Detection-System).

He designed a TensorFlow CNN for a dataset of over 5,000 chest X-rays to detect pneumonia, involving data augmentation and benchmarking against other models. You can view a similar project on [GitHub](https://github.com/ARPurohit07/Skin-Disease-Detection).
He developed a Streamlit app for bulk image downloading that uses CLIP-based filtering for intelligent searching. You can view the code on [GitHub](https://github.com/ARPurohit07/Image-Downloader).

Rohan has completed two internships. At Bharat Electronics Limited (BEL), he engineered a defence-grade object detection pipeline for drone tracking, increasing accuracy to over 85%. At Pan India Consultants, he built a C#/.NET communication tool and integrated PostgreSQL databases, improving data access speed by 20%.

He is currently pursuing a B.E. in Computer Science Engineering from Thapar Institute of Engineering & Technology, Patiala (2022-Present). He achieved 97% in his Class XII exams and 91.3% in his Class X exams.
He holds a certification in Data Structures in C++ from Coding Ninjas.
Rohan was the Former Head of the Fine Arts & Photography Society. His interests include sketching, sculpture, and tennis.
You can contact Rohan via email at rohanpurohit14@gmail.com or by phone at +91-8588850024.
You can find Rohan on [GitHub](https://github.com/ARPurohit07) and connect with him on [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/rohan-purohit-b65062277).
